item.title: TD Securities Completes Acquisition of Albert Fried & Company
item.description: [PR Newswire] - TORONTO and NEW YORK, Jan. 3, 2017 /PRNewswire/ - TD Securities today completed the previously announced acquisition of Albert Fried & Company (AF&Co), which advances its U.S growth strategy. TD Securities plans to complete the technology platform development with the aim to be fully operational in the prime brokerage business in 2017. The Toronto-Dominion Bank and its subsidiaries are collectively known as TD Bank Group ("TD" or the "Bank").

item.title: Two Out of Three Americans (67.1 percent) Would Rather Spend the Holidays with Extended Family than at a Resort with a Partner or Friends, Says TD Bank Survey
item.description: [PR Newswire] - CHERRY HILL, N.J., Dec. 20, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- More than two-thirds of Americans believe there's no place like home for the holidays – with 67.1 percent of those surveyed stating that they'd rather spend the holidays with extended family than at a resort with a partner or close friends (32.9 percent), according to the 2016 TD Bank Holiday Giving Report, which surveyed 1,502 U.S. respondents aged 18 to 65+ via Google Surveys. In fact, only around one third of respondents (36.3 percent) said they don't engage in any form of charity during the holidays. "I find it heartwarming to see how many Americans believe in giving back to those in need," said Michael Carbone, Regional President, TD Bank.

item.title: TD Economics: Cloudy, With a Chance of Fireballs
item.description: [PR Newswire] - CHERRY HILL, N.J., Dec. 15, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- The American economy is back on track, but, with new leadership in Washington, the band of uncertainty around the forecasts has widened, according to a new report by TD Economics (www.td.com/economics), an affiliate of TD Bank, America's Most Convenient Bank®. "A lot has changed over the past three months, even as the economy has advanced in line with our expectations," says TD Bank's Chief Economist, Beata Caranci.
